text:
Free eBooks at Planet eBook.com

Marfa Petrovna left Dounia three thousand roubles. No doubt about it. She set it up a week before she died, and I was there to witness it. Dounia can claim the cash in two to three weeks. 

“Are you serious?” 

“Yep, let her know. Anyway, I’m just around the corner.” 

As he left, Svidrigaïlov bumped into Razumihin in the doorway.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov reveals that Marfa Petrovna left three thousand roubles to Dounia before her death.
